udropship_customer_tracking_email_templa.label: Customer Tracking ID Notification for Guests

unsubscribe_wishlist.label: Do you want to unsubscribe wishlist

vendor_payment_methods.label: Payment Methods Dont Want in store
vendor_payment_methods.note: This Payment Filter Is for Vendor. Vendor can disable payment methods which he don't want to use for his store.

vendoradmin_payment_methods.label: Payment Methods Administrator want to Disable for vendor.
vendoradmin_payment_methods.note: This Payment Filter Is for Admin. Admin can disable payment methods which is not applicable for this vendor.

ship_handling_time.label: Handling Time
ship_handling_time.note: Time to Ship after receiving payment

check_pay_to.label: Cheque to be made in Name of

tax_regions.label: Tax Regions
tax_regions.note:
Specifies in which states this vendor's products are taxable.
If no states are selected, the tax will be calculated using regular Magento tax rules.
Only for US.

limit_zipcode.label: Limit to zipcodes
limit_zipcode.note:
Each rule should be separated with new line, comma or semicolon.
Possible rules:
1) Simple glob expression
     SK6????
     SK6+
     SK6 12*
2) Range
     90000-91000
3) Exact value
     90210

vendor_po_grid_sortby.label: Default shipment sort by in vendor interface

vendor_po_grid_status_filter.label: Default shipment status filter in vendor interface

endicia_balance_threshold.label: Balance Threshold
endicia_balance_threshold.note: Leave empty to disable automatic funding of the account

fedex_itn.label: ITN (Internal Transaction Number)
fedex_itn.note:
For shipments requiring an EEI/SED, enter the ITN number received from AES when you filed your shipment or the FTR (Foreign Trade Regulations) exemption number.
Proper format: AES XYYYYMMDDNNNNNN where YYYYMMDD is date and NNNNNN are numbers generated by the AES.
Apply at http://www.aesdirect.gov

local_if_in_stock.label: When in stock use local, otherwise use vendor

udropship.title: Drop Shipping
udropship.specificerrmsg: This shipping method is currently unavailable. If you would like to ship using this shipping method, please contact us.
